name: fanaticism

disapproving extreme beliefs that may lead to unreasonable or violent behaviour: religious fanaticism Fanaticism has already destroyed countless lives.
informal extreme interest in something, to a degree that some people find unreasonable: the fanaticism of football fans His fitness fanaticism sets him apart from his friends. See
fanatical
